attributes.action: Make the Government acknowledge the subject of the petition in their response
attributes.additional_details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104334

There is literally no mention of the Health Secretary or his ability to perform in his role in their response. Government responses to petitions should actually work on addressing the issues put forward instead of trying to use this website as a platform to protect their own image. It's disgraceful and does nothing but suggest that this website is a sham and that the Government is not actually at all interested in listening to our views.
attributes.background: In response to the petition to debate a vote of no confidence in Health Secretary, Jeremy Hunt. The government has completely side-stepped the issue of his credibility and has instead used the platform to restate their plans for the NHS.
